page.title: 11VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: The{village shop}opens at 8.30a.m.It employs 6 people.{Fruit, vegetables and{fish}are brought from the {wholesale market}by the owner of the shop and the assistants help to unload. During the morning customers telephone in their{orders.}The owner delivers these at lunchtime; it takes him about 1.5 hours and there can be from 8 to 15 orders. During the late afternoon the shelves are{restocked}for the next day and the market order prepared.The staff finish at 5.30p.m. and the shop shuts at 6p.m. When the shop has shut the tills have to be{cashed_up,}the{bread orders prepared for the next day and the shop floor washed. After the owners have had their evening meal the{account {books}and{VAT returns}are prepared.
